mainHero.title: Revolutionize Your Aquarium Experience with
mainHero.subtitle: AI-Powered Management
mainHero.description: Effortlessly monitor and optimize your aquarium with cutting-edge AI technology. Intelligently stock your aquarium with AI-driven suggestions, manage multiple aquariums seamlessly, and stay informed with both automated insight and personalized care recommendations to keep your aquatic life thriving.

items.title: Your Personal Aquarium Assistant
items.description: Aquamind harnesses the power of AI to make aquarium management easier than ever. From intelligent stocking suggestions to automated monitoring, Aquamind is designed to simplify your aquarium care, so you can focus on enjoying your aquatic world.

items.title: Effortless Multi-Aquarium Management
items.description: Whether you own a single tank or manage multiple aquariums, Aquamind centralizes all your data and insights in one intuitive dashboard. Gain personalized recommendations and actionable alerts that keep all your tanks thriving with minimal effort.

features.title: Advanced Aquarium Management
features.subtitle: Your All-in-One Solution for Intelligent Aquarium Care
features.description: Discover the cutting-edge features that make managing your aquarium simple, efficient, and enjoyable. With AI-driven insights, health checks, and customizable options, Aquamind empowers you to maintain a thriving aquatic environment.

items.name: Intelligent AI Feedback
items.description: Get real-time, AI-driven feedback on your aquariums to optimize their conditions and ensure a balanced ecosystem.

items.name: Health & Compatibility Checks
items.description: Receive detailed health checks on your tank's water quality, fish, and plant compatibility to prevent potential issues.

items.name: Manage Fish & Plants Easily
items.description: Keep track of your fish and plants with ease. Manage and monitor their wellbeing with an intuitive interface.

items.name: Add Custom Equipment
items.description: Enhance your tank by adding and managing custom equipment like filters, heaters, and lighting for tailored care.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
